In the culture where I grew up, people are curious about foreigners. I have been a foreigner in SwedenÂ sinceÂ Aug 2010. And IÂ remain curious about the world around me, even though I’ve been here more than one year, it’sÂ stillÂ new to me.Â Iâ€˜m going to tell youÂ several thingsÂ whichÂ I don’t understand about Sweden ğŸ˜€Â It is interesting toÂ explain why,Â butÂ at the same timeÂ avoidÂ givingÂ a ‘right’ answer.
